scroll_text.default: Welcome to Messenger! Stay connected with your friends and family. You can customize the scrolling text through the scroll-text.txt file.
app.title: Messenger
chat.title: Chat
audio_player.not_supported: Your browser does not support audio playback.

version.update_content:
feat: add dark mode support with new stylesheet
Introduce dark.css to support dark mode with improved contrast and readability. The stylesheet includes optimized colors for UI elements, scrollbars, modals, inputs, and messages to enhance user experience in dark environments.
